herosection.subtitle: AI Diagnoses, Doctor-Verified â€” Smarter Eye Care Decisions

welcomesection.title: Welcome to Fundus.cloud Website
welcomesection.text: This platform allows doctors to review AI-generated eye condition diagnoses sent by opticians, assess their accuracy, and provide final medical evaluations. Doctors can also access the patientâ€™s history and offer action-oriented recommendations.

about.title: About Us
about.sectionParagraph: Fundus.cloud is a smart, AI-powered platform designed to support collaboration between opticians and doctors in delivering high-quality eye care. Our system enables opticians to upload eye images for automated analysis using advanced machine learning models. These models generate preliminary diagnostic reports, which are then reviewed by specialized doctors via the Fundus.cloud website. Doctors play a crucial role on the platform by evaluating the AI-generated diagnoses, confirming or correcting them based on their expertise, and determining if any medical action is needed. They also have access to patientsâ€™ medical histories and detailed AI reports, helping them make well-informed decisions. Fundus.cloud bridges the gap between early optical assessments and professional medical validation â€” making patient care faster, smarter, and more reliable.

privacysection.title: Privacy
privacysection.intro_1: We at fundus.cloud ("we", "our", "us") are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy in accordance with the European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the German Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG), and all applicable laws and professional confidentiality obligations in Germany related to medical data.
privacysection.intro_2: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and share your personal data, particularly sensitive health information, when you visit our website https://fundus.cloud, use our services, or otherwise interact with us.
privacysection.data_controller_text:
The data controller for the processing of your personal data is:
fundus.cloud
Email: support@augenarzt.cloud
privacysection.data_categories_intro: We may process the following categories of personal data:
health_data_items: Medical images (e.g., retinal scans, diagnostic images)
Medical history (if submitted by user or physician)
Uploaded documents or files containing health data
privacysection.data_categories_note: This includes data voluntarily submitted by opticians, doctors, or patients, or data we generate through our diagnostic platform.
privacysection.data_recipients_intro: We do not share your data unless:
data_recipients_items: Needed for secure data storage under GDPR-compliant terms
data_retention_items: Health data stored for up to 10 years
Data deleted upon request (Art. 17 GDPR), unless legally required
privacysection.gdpr_rights_complaint: Right to lodge a complaint: https://www.bfdi.bund.de
privacysection.cookies_text: Essential cookies only; analytics cookies used with consent. Preferences manageable via browser or banner.
privacysection.data_transfers_text: No data is transferred outside the EEA unless under EU safeguards.
privacysection.automated_decision_text: AI suggestions do not replace professional medical judgment.
privacysection.children_text: Not intended for users under 16 without parental consent.
privacysection.policy_changes_text: We may update this notice. Latest version is available at https://fundus.cloud.

termssection.title: Terms
termssection.intro: Welcome to fundus.cloud ("we", "our", "us"). By accessing or using our website https://fundus.cloud, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our services.
termssection.scope_note: All services are currently offered free of charge.
termssection.no_treatment_title: 2. No Medical Treatment or Paid Services
termssection.no_treatment_text: We do not provide direct treatment or commercial services. The platform supportsâ€”but does not replaceâ€”medical expertise.
user_eligibility_items: Only qualified opticians and doctors may use the platform
Users must upload lawful, accurate, and relevant medical data
termssection.data_protection_text: We comply with GDPR and BDSG. Users must ensure patient consent is obtained before uploading data. See our Privacy Policy for full details.
termssection.intellectual_property_text: All content belongs to fundus.cloud unless otherwise noted. Users may not copy, alter, or redistribute any part without written permission.
liability_items: Clinical decisions based on platform use
termssection.liability_note: Use is at the userâ€™s own risk.
termssection.modification_text: We reserve the right to update or suspend services at any time. Changes will be announced via https://fundus.cloud.
termssection.termination_text: We may suspend users who violate terms or upload harmful/illegal content.
termssection.governing_law_text: German law applies. Disputes fall under German courtsâ€™ jurisdiction.
